title: What a Lovely Day – Mad Max: Fury Road Gets Remade as an 8-bit Video Game
text:
What a Lovely Day – Mad Max: Fury Road Gets Remade as an 8-bit Video Game 
Published By: EntertainmentBuddha.com - Today 
The CineFix YouTube channel has released its latest gamified 8-bit version of a popular film, and this time around Mad Max: Fury Road gets...
